description: Explains how news is gathered and disseminated in Germany. From an enormous amount of information culled from reporters, foreign correspondents, news agencies, radio satellites and many other sources, the editors shape the final story. This news story is spread within the country and overseas by radio, television, illuminated news signs, films, radio picture transmission newspapers and other media.
